reviews.review: Наиграв среднее количество часов игры, смело могу сказать что это игра очень хороша, развивает тимплей, так что для эгоистов она не очень то подходит, главное спасать своих товарищей, конечно есть кемперы и с ними надо говорить отднльно но в целом игра очень хороша

И не надо ставить "не рекомендую эту игру только из-за того, что вы не умеете играть. У игры есть баланс, но своеобразный, нужно придумывать тактику против каждого маньяка(кроме призрака). Шикарная игра в плане идеи, графона и геймплея. Бывают мелкие баги которые работчики убирают при обновлении. Предупреждение! В игре много прокачанных маньяков, у тех у кого нервы слишком остро реагирует на проигрыш, можете не покупать. Остальным, приятной игры.

I'm sorry, but after so many hours I can say that I don't think this game is worth your time. It can be quite fun to discover what is new, but we are in 2022 almost and this game is really starting to fall behind. As a veteran player, there is just not enough done to shake the game up or play with the meta. I think the game is a good time for beginners, but it will get stale after a while.

I'm just gonna say that I like this game what more do you want from me? xddd

I mainly play as survivor even though I die first like all the time lmao just because I'm really trash at killer but I also find playing the killer still fun anyway. There are many different survivors/killers you can play as which is also really cool so you don't get bored from playing the same killer and or survivor. I also personally actually like the killers more then the survivors just character/backstory wise.

I only really play this game for fun I can't really get myself to be that sweaty type of person when playing this game most of the time anyway.
 
Also my favorite killers are the Trickster and the Huntress and will most likely always be my favorite killers :)

The game started out with some issues, but after a year it has become a really solid experience. I would recommend it to anyone who even remotely likes horror games, multiplayer games, or even oddly enough competitive games. 

There are some bugs here and there, but not near as bad as there once were, and it's sure a hell of a lot better than any similar games that are out there right now. The dev team also has a weekly stream where they address issues and talk to the community. Honestly for the amount of potential entertainment you can get, this game is a steal at $20. Highly recommended.

一款全民生气的搞笑游戏

Se lo compro un amigo para jugar conmigo, y su primera impresion fue lo que en realidad es el juego. Cuando se dio cuenta no lo podia devolver por que ya tenia las 2 horas de juego y el 80% del tiempo estubo en pantallas de carga y buscando partida; al entrar en la primera partida era un asesino friendly. Si no fuera por que el juego engancha, estaria totalmente abandonado.

Tras el ultimo parche 1.5.3 aparecen nuevos bugs que te impiden iniciar partida con amigos. te saca al lobby donde se buggea y te obliga a cerrar, o te echa del juego diciendo que no tienes internet. Rezemos para que no falle la hoguera, y asi seguira manteniendo esa sensacion de hogar, hogar bugueado.

Mi experiencia:
Dead by Bugligth
Llevo mucho tiempo con este juego, he visto su evolución y he disfrutado mucho jugandolo.
Lamentablemente tambien he visto como los desarrolladores no hacen caso a lo que ocurre en el juego, como lo han abandonado meses enteros con bugs increibles y les ha dado igual; una lista que ya no se puede tolerar. Y como siempre, si a la comunidad no le haces caso, te abandona, y este sera mi caso.

En la beta le di una review negativa pero el juego ha evolucionado un montón, hace más de un año que no juego pero me proporcionó bastantes horas de diversión y me parecía injusto dejarle una reseña negativa.
Dead dy Daylight стала прибыльным придатком для Behaviour, со всеми из вытекающими из этого последствиями, и перестала быть хорошей игрой для меня.

I love this game, It is has great game play and is very intense when being chased by a killer. I do feel as though if a killer hunts you down, ignoring all interruption (tunnle vision) it can be extremly difficult to escape him but maybe that is just because I am just not that good at the game.

anyway I think it is an amazing game.

Spiel ist gut aber die Community ist scheiße als erstes sollte man bevor man das Spiel kauft die Kommentarfunktion unter dem Steamprofil ausschalten weil dort viele Spieler ihren Frust ablassen wurde dort schon mehrfach beleidigt sogar als Nazi betitelt ohne möglichkeit es bei Steam zu melden.

Spielst du als Killer fair wirst du in einer nicht so erfolgreichen Runde von swf zu tode verarscht und geteebagt als solo Survivor campen die Killer und man verbringt die Zeit im Spiel mit hängen und dann zu sterben weil man fast immer getunnelt wird die mechaniken die das verhindern sollen sind allesamt schlecht und werden nie verbessert. Neu dazu gekommen ist der ingame Shop der für Echtgeld Kleidung bietet und die Preise sind alle überteuert 10 € für einen Skin .... man kann auch ingame etwa die hälfte der Skins durch Blutscherben kostenlos erspielen aber das dauert für einen Skin schon mal 2 Monate sammeln dazu kommt das die gut aussehenden Skins nicht kostenlos erspielbar sind.

Meine meinung ist wenn euch das Spiel gefällt testet es mit der Basisversion aus (IM SALE KAUFEN das Spiel ist sehr oft  im Sale) aber achtung der anfang ist extrem hart weil man ohne die guten perks startet und sofort gegen die übelsten Killer die alles haben antreten muss (es haben schon einige ihre Tastatur durch das Spiel zermanscht).

When I just bought this game, I thought that it was not worth your money, but then I realized that this game is addicting and there are many interesting things in it. I do not jelly that I gave money for such an excellent game! I advise everyone to buy it.

This game is awesome, I have been very impressed so far with the game mechanics. It seems like any time there are any bugs they are fixed relatively quickly. I would say however I would love for there to be some kind of story mode, like in Left for Dead. The game does at time feel repetitive, but it’s especially fun to enjoy with friends. At times some of the killers seem to be way over powered, and the Haddonfield map, is way too small, especially when playing with an overpowered player. I would say the enjoyment of this game all depends on the players you are matched with. Some of the killers like to camp, which make it impossible to save your allies, so if you do start playing, don't do that, it just makes the game boring. I’d also like to see a few other changes like a better chance to escape hooks.

After 500 hours I've definitelly enjoyed the game. It takes time to learn all the perks and jukes, but it gets crazy fun. Being a survivor becomes an obsession, but to get good, I've played few killers just to learn their weaknesses. Can't wait to see where this game goes. I've gotten all the DLC content, and Mikey is definitelly my favorite so far. Brings out the classic horror game feel.

Pros:
-graphics
-story line
-team-survival
-physics engine is superb
-natural movements
-realistic speed, good match lengths
-perks and special abilities
-each character has their own power
-ability to spectate


Cons:
-some trashy players make the game terrible at times
-killers overpowered at certain points
-no proximity talk (PLEASE)
-slow development for fixing biggest complains
-glitches on killing animations
-connection/lag even with great internet
-matchmaking sometimes makes no sense (level 1 with level 18 players)

If you want to play a great team-effort game, ready to help others to survive, this game is great. Don't expect great killers all the time, they do exist, but it's like 50/50 chance you'll get some killer who will camp or face-camp you.

This game is an amazing concept.  I like it, I really do. 
Do you like:
Unleashing your sadistic tendencies upon avatars of other people?
Playing Predator and Prey and playing phsycologically?
Getting Jumpscared almost every day?
Juking stuff?
Sneaking around?
Basements?
Getting within an inch of your life?
And finally, sacrificing people to an old world cult god hell bent on living through sacrifices?
Then this game is for you!
It's true, this game has flaws. Most of them technical, but still playable. I really recommend this game if you want to have a good time. However, get some friends to play it with. Some of the community are.... volatile.  F13 is a good comparison. Just think deeper lore, more killers, and perhaps more mechanics. /b SEE YOU IN THE TRIAL, MY FRIEND.

DONT BUY THIS GAME! HERE IS WHY:
I invested this game 400+ hours. But developers did not fix a simple error called "Error - 101". Some kind of synchronization error. Everytime a game finishes I get an error message and I can't earn bloodpoints.
 - This is why I quit the game. I have all the dlcs and some good skins. 
- There are a lot of topics in the forum about this. But devs don't give a shit. Cuz people having this error is like %1-%2 of the community. Not the majority. 
- I don't recommend this game to anyone. Go play something else where developers really care about the players.

サイコパスな殺人鬼に"ルール"を設けたがるサバイバーを顔真っ赤にさせて遊ぶゲーム。
他の人達もレビューしている通り、サバイバー側から殺人鬼への煽りが凄いです（ランクが上がっていくにつれ）。
屈伸、ストロボライトなんかは相手も楽しんでいるんだろうな、って思えるんですが、ゲーム後罵詈雑言の嵐。
煽ってくる奴が居ても相手にせず「gg」とだけタイプして、紳士でありつつ冷酷な殺人鬼を演じましょう。

サバイバー「キャンプ上手いな！ボーイスカウトで火の起こし方からでも習ったのか？○○野郎！」
殺人鬼「gg」

Ich liebe dieses Spiel <3
Es ist sehr abwechslungsreich, da man immer neue Mitspieler hat und somit jede Runde einzigartig spannend wird. 
Mit meinen knapp 150 Spielstunden (das ist für viele best wenig aaber hey^^) wird es mir nicht langweilig. Immerhin gibt es durch die täglichen Rituale, das Rangsystem und das Blutnetz eine gute Abwechslung zum immer gleichen Spielprinzip. Dazu tragen natürlich auch die updates bei, welche halbwegs regelmäßig neue features in das Spiel einbringen:)
Allerdings lässt meiner Meinung nach das Lobbysystem noch etwas zu wünschen übrig, da man (vorallem abends) doch sehr lange warten muss, bis man eine Runde findet.
Da das Spiel sehr auf Teamarbeit basiert und sehr viele Leute in Gruppen das Spiel spielen, fände ich es eine gute Möglichkeit auch innerhalb der Runden klarer mit seinen "Mitüberlebenden" absprechen zu können.
Alles in Allem ist es ein sehr empfehlendswertes Spiel und seine 20€ definitiv Wert:) dlcs kann man sich ja optional dazu kaufen^^

Dead by Daylight идеально воссоздает кульминацию почти любого слэшера: когда сценами обильного кровопускания зрителей уже развлекли и дело идет к развязке. Выжившие герои нашли путь к спасению. Они уже знают, что именно нужно сделать, чтобы ускользнуть от маньяка и вернуться домой, сохранив все конечности. Но безжалостный убийца идет по пятам. Все решают минуты. История вот-вот закончится.
